name: @continuum/jtag
description: Production-grade universal debugging system. One import = console routing + WebSocket logging + screenshot capture. Zero config, works everywhere.
author: Continuum Development Team

scripts.start: npm run kill && npm run smart-build && npm run system:deploy && npm run system:run
scripts.kill: tmux kill-session -t jtag-test 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:9002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:9001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf dist/ 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf examples/dist/ 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f *.tgz 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:ts
scripts.postbuild: npm run paths:clean && npx tsx scripts/create-import-map.ts && npx tsx scripts/convert-imports-to-relative.ts
scripts.prepack: npm run paths:clean && npx tsx scripts/create-import-map.ts
scripts.system:stop: pkill -f 'npm.*start' 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:9002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:9001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; tmux kill-session -t jtag-test 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.system:restart: npm run system:stop && npm run system:start && npm run system:wait
scripts.test:tty: tmux kill-session -t debug-npm 2>/dev/null; rm -f /tmp/debug-npm.log; tmux new-session -d -s debug-npm "script -q /dev/null npm run clean" \; pipe-pane -o 'cat >> /tmp/debug-npm.log'
scripts.system:debug: echo '=== Tmux session state ===' && (tmux has-session -t jtag-test 2>/dev/null && echo 'Session running' && tmux capture-pane -t jtag-test -p || echo 'Session not running') && echo '' && echo '=== Log file ===' && tail -20 .continuum/jtag/system/logs/npm-start.log
scripts.test:all: npm run test:layer-1 && npm run test:layer-2 && npm run test:layer-3 && npm run test:layer-4 && npm run test:promise-event-system && npm run test:layer-5 && npm run test:layer-6 && npm run test:verify
scripts.test:layer-1: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 1: Foundation + Browser Bootstrap' && npm run test:foundation && npm run test:browser-bootstrap
scripts.test:layer-2: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 2: Daemon Processes + Browser Connection' && npm run test:daemons && npm run test:browser-connection
scripts.test:layer-3: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 3: Message Transport + Browser WebSocket' && npm run test:transport && npm run test:browser-transport
scripts.test:layer-4: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 4: System Integration + Browser Commands' && npm run test:integration && npm run test:browser-commands
scripts.test:promise-event-system: echo 'ðŸ§… Promise/Event System: Type-Safe Messages + Promise Chain Tests' && npx tsx tests/promise-event-system-test-suite.ts
scripts.test:layer-5: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 5: Console Interception + Browser Logging' && npm run test:console && npm run test:browser-logging
scripts.test:layer-6: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 6: End-to-End + Browser Automation' && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:browser-automation
scripts.posttest:layer-6: npm run logs:show && npm run system:stop
scripts.test:foundation: npx tsx tests/layer-1-foundation/types-compilation.test.ts && npx tsx tests/layer-1-foundation/encoding-abstraction.test.ts && npx tsx tests/unit/JTAGMessageTypes.test.ts && npx tsx tests/unit/ResponseCorrelator.test.ts && npx tsx tests/unit/JTAGMessageQueue.test.ts
scripts.test:integration: npx tsx tests/layer-4-system-integration/daemon-transport.test.ts && npx tsx tests/layer-4-system-integration/message-flow.test.ts && npx tsx tests/layer-4-system-integration/promise-chain-cross-context.test.ts
scripts.test:verify: echo 'ðŸŽ¯ All JTAG middle-out tests passed!' && npm run logs:show
